name: altopthb
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wceq(caltop(c0, c1), caltop(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wceq(caltop(c0, c1), caltop(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))

|- wb(wceq(caltop(c0, c1), caltop(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

comment: Alternate ordered pair theorem with different sethood requirements. See ~ altopth for more comments. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Apr-2012.)
